1 #!/usr/bin/env python3
2 import rospy
3 from uarm_msgs.srv import *
4 from std_srvs.srv import *
5 from uarm_msgs.msg import *
6 from geometry_msgs.msg import Point
7 from light_interface import uArm_sim_Server
8 import time
9 import json
10 import actionlib
11 
12 #sends move command to control_uarm
13 
14 
31 
32 class uArm_Remote_Server():
33 
34  def __init__(self,ns="", part=""):
35  self.mutex = True #False while a function is in progress
36  self.name = ns+part #namespace for topics and action servers
37  self.uarm_pos = [0,0,0,90]
38 
39  self.move_action_server = actionlib.SimpleActionServer(str(self.name+'uarm_move'), uarm_msgs.msg.uarm_moveAction, self.move, auto_start = False)
40  self.move_action_server.start()
41  self.set_pump_service = rospy.Service(str(self.name+'uarm_set_pump'), uarm_pump, self.set_pump)
42  self.recalibration_action_server = actionlib.SimpleActionServer(str(self.name+'uarm_reset'), uarm_msgs.msg.uarm_moveAction, self.reset, auto_start = False)
43  self.recalibration_action_server.start()
44  self.state_service = rospy.Service(str(self.name+'uarm_get_state'), uarm_get_state, self.get_state)
45  self.auto_move_action_server = actionlib.SimpleActionServer(str(self.name+'uarm_auto_move'), uarm_msgs.msg.uarm_moveAction, self.auto_move, auto_start = False)
46  self.auto_move_action_server.start()
47  self.position_listener = rospy.Subscriber(str(self.name+"position"), uarm_state, self.callback)
48  self.uarm = uArm_sim_Server(ns=ns, part=part) #instance of light interface
49  rospy.loginfo('%s: started' % (str(self.name+'server')))
50  #print("uarm_listener started")
51  self.uarm.move(180,0,130,90)
52 
53 
55  def callback(self, data):
56  self.uarm_pos = [data.x, data.y, data.z, data.w]
57 
58  def move(self, data):
59  result = uarm_msgs.msg.uarm_moveResult()
60  if self.mutex == True:
61  self.mutex = False
62  # api-endpoint
63  if not self.uarm.move(int(data.x),int(data.y),int(data.z), int(data.w)):
64  result.success = False
65  self.mutex = True
66  return self.move_action_server.set_succeeded(result)
67  moving_time = rospy.get_time()
68  while self.uarm.busy:
69  if self.move_action_server.is_preempt_requested() or rospy.get_time()-moving_time > 10:
70  #print("recieved cancle request")
71  rospy.loginfo('%s: goal canceled or time limit expired' % (str(self.name)))
72  result.success = False
73  self.uarm.stop()
74  self.mutex = True
75  return self.move_action_server.set_preempted()
76 
77  self.mutex = True
78  rospy.loginfo('%s: new goal reached [%i, %i, %i, %i]' % (str(self.name), int(data.x),int(data.y),int(data.z), int(data.w)))
79 
80  result.success = True
81  return self.move_action_server.set_succeeded(result)
82  else:
83  rospy.loginfo('%s: working on other task - target rejected' % (str(self.name+'uarm_move server')))
84  result.success = False
85  return self.move_action_server.set_succeeded(result)
86 
87  #pick up cargo and delivers to destination
88  def auto_move(self, data):
89  result = uarm_msgs.msg.uarm_moveResult()
90  positions = [[self.uarm_pos[0],self.uarm_pos[1],130, 90], [int(data.x), int(data.y), 130, 90], [int(data.x), int(data.y), int(data.z), int(data.w)]]
91  if self.mutex == True:
92  self.mutex = False
93  # api-endpoint
94  for i in positions:
95  if not self.uarm.move(i[0], i[1], i[2], i[3]):
96  result.success = False
97  self.mutex = True
98  return self.auto_move_action_server.set_succeeded(result)
99  moving_time = rospy.get_time()
100  while self.uarm.busy:
101  if self.auto_move_action_server.is_preempt_requested() or rospy.get_time()-moving_time > 5:
102  rospy.loginfo('%s: goal canceled or time limit expired' % (str(self.name)))
103  #print("recieved cancle request")
104  result.success = False
105  self.uarm.stop()
106  self.mutex = True
107  return self.auto_move_action_server.set_preempted()
108  result.success = True
109  rospy.loginfo('%s: new goal reached [%i, %i, %i, %i]' % (str(self.name), int(data.x),int(data.y),int(data.z),int(data.w)))
110  self.mutex = True
111  return self.auto_move_action_server.set_succeeded(result)
112  else:
113  result.success = False
114  return self.auto_move_action_server.set_succeeded(result)
115 
116 
117  def set_pump(self, data):
118  rospy.loginfo(rospy.get_caller_id() + " I heard %s", str(data.run) )
119  if self.mutex == True:
120  self.mutex = False
121 
122  self.uarm.set_pump(data.run)
123 
124  self.mutex = True
125  return uarm_pumpResponse(True)
126  else:
127  return uarm_pumpResponse(False)
128 
129  def reset(self, data):
130  result = uarm_msgs.msg.uarm_moveResult()
131  if self.mutex == True:
132  self.mutex = False
133  # api-endpoint
134  if not self.uarm.move(180, 0, 130, 90):
135  result.success = False
136  self.mutex = True
137  return self.recalibration_action_server.set_succeeded(result)
138  moving_time = rospy.get_time()
139  while self.uarm.busy:
140  if self.recalibration_action_server.is_preempt_requested() or rospy.get_time()-moving_time > 5:
141  print("recieved cancle request")
142  result.success = False
143  self.uarm.stop()
144  self.mutex = True
145  return self.recalibration_action_server.set_preempted()
146 
147  self.mutex = True
148  rospy.loginfo('%s: resetted' % (str(self.name)))
149  result.success = True
150  return self.recalibration_action_server.set_succeeded(result)
151  else:
152  result.success = False
153  return self.recalibration_action_server.set_succeeded(result)
154 
155  #service instead of publisher, because real uArm has to be stopped to get position
156  def get_state(self, data):
157  rospy.loginfo(rospy.get_caller_id() + "I heard %s", str(data) )
158  if self.mutex == True:
159  return uarm_get_stateResponse(ready = True, pump = self.uarm.pump_state, x = int(self.uarm_pos[0]), y = int(self.uarm_pos[1]), z = int(self.uarm_pos[2]))#, w = int(self.uarm_pos[3]))
160  else:
161  return uarm_get_stateResponse(ready = False, pump = self.uarm.pump_state, x = int(self.uarm_pos[0]), y = int(self.uarm_pos[1]), z = int(self.uarm_pos[2]))#, w = int(self.uarm_pos[3]))
162 
163 if __name__ == '__main__':
164  rospy.init_node('uarm_listener', anonymous=True)
165  try:
166  ns = rospy.get_param('~ns')
167  except:
168  ns = "uarm1/"
169  try:
170  part = rospy.get_param('~part')
171  except:
172  part=""
173  server = uArm_Remote_Server(ns=ns,part=part)
174  rospy.spin()
